item.title: Development environment
item.description: Development environment (Windows 11) # MSYS2 # install MSYS2 # Q: stuck on 66% in the first installation S: kill the process re-install packages # pacman -S git zsh vim # ~/.zshrc alias vi='vim' # complete hard drives in msys2 drives=$(mount | sed -rn 's#^[A-Z]: on /([a-z]).*#\1#p' | tr '\n' ' ') zstyle ':completion:*' fake-files /: "/:$drives" unset drives MSYS2 respond slowly # local user $ mkpasswd -l -c > /etc/passwd $ mkgroup -l -c > /etc/group disable db in /etc/nsswitch.
